4305630.name: Stray Night
4305630.description:
Stray Night

â€œFace your true self within the nightmares of a stray cat in the dead of night.â€

About This Game

Stray Night is a puzzle-build roguelite hack-and-slash game that follows the journey of a stray cat enduring the hardships of street life as it discovers its true identity through nightly dreams. Transform the struggles of reality into powerful combat within the dream world. Build your own survival style through ever-changing skill combinations and complete the inner growth of a lonely stray cat.

Story

In a narrow, cold alleyway, an unnamed stray cat fights for survival every day. Just as the cat becomes numb to the recurring hunger and the cold stares of strangersâ€”even to the feeling of "loneliness" itselfâ€”mysterious nightmares begin to haunt its sleep.

Inside the dream, the cat transforms into a powerful humanoid being, yet the world is filled with monsters manifested from its real-life hardships. The cat must break through the "Wall of Loneliness" that blocks its path and venture deeper into its inner self.

Waiting at the end of this journey is the "self of yesterday" and the true essence of who the cat is. Will the stray cat be able to overcome the nightmares and achieve true inner growth?

Gameplay

Stray Night is a single-player action game that combines the strategic depth of a roguelite with the thrill of hack-and-slash, focusing on the following elements:

  • Hack-and-Slash Combat: Experience fast-paced action, crushing manifestations of inner wounds with flashy skills and responsive controls.

  • Unique Puzzle-Build System: Go beyond simply choosing skills. Combine enhancement blocks like puzzle pieces to customize the shape and power of your projectiles in real-time.

  • Bosses with Unique Gimmicks: Engage in battles with various bosses, each hiding unique mechanics tied to the game's narrative.

  • Roguelite Randomness: Develop new combat strategies in every run with randomly provided skills and enhancement fragments.

  • Dreamcatcher Progression System: Even in defeat, record your combat experience in the "Dreamcatcher" to permanently upgrade your character's base stats.

  • Companionship with Favorite Toys: Bring the bonds formed in reality into your dreams. Your favorite toys become powerful supporters that assist you in battle.

  • Stage-based Narrative Growth: Follow a chapter-based story that begins by overcoming the first wall of "Loneliness" to eventually find your true essence.

Key Features
